Regulation Name(s): Herpes simplex virus nucleic acid amplification assay
Specimen Container(s): Becton Dickinson Universal Viral Transport Media
Copan branded Universal Transport Medium for LabCorp
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Luminex ARIES HSV 1&2 Assay, a PCR-based qualitative test for direct detection and differentiation of HSV 1 and 2 DNA from lesion specimens using the ARIES System.
Indications for Use Summary: A real-time PCR-based qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for direct detection and differentiation of Herpes Simplex Virus 1 and 2 DNA in cutaneous or mucocutaneous lesion specimens from symptomatic patients, as an aid in diagnosis of HSV infection, for use on the ARIES System.
